title: Elementary Science Project-Based Learning Utilizing Virtual Ecological Ponds

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Web-based VR learning environment utilizing personal smart devices (mobile/tablet), with team-based ecological survey projects

learning_goals: Learners can describe at least three interaction relationships among aquatic organisms in a virtual ecological pond.
Learners can construct an ecological pyramid and design a food web based on observational data.
Learners can express ecosystem conservation strategies using mathematical statistics (mean/percentage) through team-based projects.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
